snippet: The site of the senseless killing of schoolchildren is now a base of operations for TV news; in Puerto Rico, a free-speaking puppet with a TV show may have crossed a line; and an escapee from tech blogging returns on his own terms.
abstract: The site of the senseless killing of schoolchildren is now a base of operations for TV news; in Puerto Rico, a free-speaking puppet with a TV show may have crossed a line; and an escapee from tech blogging returns on his own terms.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Reporting From Newtown, and a Puppet Provocateur
